Package com.epam.training.booklibrary.dao.implementations

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DAOAuthors
    The class contains methods for work with authors of books
    DAOBookGenres
    The class contains methods for work with genres of books
    DAOBooks
    The class contains methods for work with books
    DAOBookSections
    The class contains methods for work with sections of literature
    DAOOrders
    Класс содержит методы для работы с заказами на книги
    DAOOrderTypes
    The class contains methods for work with types of orders
    DAOPublishers
    The class contains methods for work with the list of Publishing houses
    DAOSearchBookCriteria
    The class contains methods on preparation of inquiries for a DB in the specified search parameters for work with the list of books
    DAOSearchOrderCriteria
    The class contains methods on preparation of inquiries for a DB in the specified search parameters for work with the list of orders for books
    DAOSearchUserCriteria
    The class contains methods on preparation of inquiries for a DB in the specified search parameters for work with the list of users
    DAOUser
    The class contains methods for work with the authorized user
    DAOUsers
    The class contains methods for work with the list of users
